page.title: 08TRANSPORT IN ONGAR
page.content: {ONGAR STATION The Epping to Ongar tube line is now only used during peak hours (06:54 to 09:16 and 17:39 to 19:24).It is at the end of the central line. It caters for students who live in the local area, commuters and OAP's. Most people in Ongar now own cars. Some have even bought cars since the partial closure.The complete closure will mainly affect the OAP's of the area and the students travelling to school and college. {ONGAR BUS SERVICE Ongar is served by several bus routes. The{32}route goes to Chelmsford;the 501 goes through Ongar from Harlow to Romford.The{201}goes to Epping,and{239 {to Brentwood.
